## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                | Type      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `muted`  | `muted`   | To mute the video                          | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `poster` | `poster`  | The image shown while the video is loading | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `src`    | `src`     | The video src                              | `string`  | `undefined` |
